broadwick

Class CliOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.CliOptions

  • public class CliOptions
extends Object
    Construct and read command line arguments. This class contains methods for extracting some of the main options such as configuration file etc.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • CliOptions

        public CliOptions(String[] args)
        Construct and provide GNU-compatible Options. Read the command line extracting the arguments, this additionally displays the help message if the command line is empty.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • buildCommandLineArguments

        private void buildCommandLineArguments()
        Construct and provide GNU-compatible Options.

      • validateCommandLineArguments

        private void validateCommandLineArguments()
        Perform validation the command line arguments.

      • getConfigurationFileName

        public final String getConfigurationFileName()
        Get the name of the configuration file specified on the command line.
        Returns:
        the name of the configuration file specified by either the -g or -c options. If neither option is specified then we return an empty string.
